info.description:
sakman agent
============

|GitHub version| |PyPI version| |Build Status|

|JWT|

What is it?
-----------

Ssh Authorized Keys MANager

| SAKman Agent is a client for SAKman Server.
| It serves the purpose of creating/updating ``~/.ssh/authorized_keys``
| It also create users that don't exist on your server but that are in
  the key-bundle.

How to install ?
----------------

Use Pip ``pip install sakman-agent``

How to use it?
--------------

| You have to fill the configuration file (see below) to connect to your
  SAKman Server.
| Then you just have to run ``sakman-agent`` as root.
| Make sure you have a Cron somewhere to update as frequently as
  possible.

Demo
----

| You can use the *DEMO APP* hosted on
  `Heroku <https://sakman.herokuapp.com%3E>`__
| You will need this key: ``L2e4BTCTWQ5TDjYKuB8dzcyjpmCTSlgb``
| User is: ``user@test.com:password``

Configuration file ``/etc/sakagent.cfg``
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::

    [agent]
    host =
    key =
    environment =

    [proxy]
    http =
    https =

Format between SAKman Agent and SAKman Server (decode)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: json

    {
      "environment": "rec",
      "users": [
        {"user1": {"email": "userkey1@test.com", "name": "userkey1", "pubkey": "laclepubliquedeuserkey1"}},
        {"user2": {"email": "userkey2@test.com", "name": "userkey2", "pubkey": "laclepubliquedeuserkey2"}}
        ],
        "pub_date": "2017-10-18T17:15:46.799689"
      }

   :target: https://badge.fury.io/gh/LaMethode%2Fsakman-agent
